sentences.en: Ancient Protector minimum range reduced to 0 from 200.
sentences.cn: 远古守卫最小射程从200减少到0.

sentences.en: Built - in heat - triggered protector prevents motor damage and extends pump life.
sentences.cn: 内设过热自动保护装置防止电机损坏,延长泵的寿命.

sentences.en: He a silent guardian, a watchful protector, a dark knight.
sentences.cn: 他是静默的卫士, 是机警的守护神, 是黑暗骑士.

sentences.en: He projected himself as the protector of national unity and harmony.
sentences.cn: 他把自己标榜成民族团结与和睦的捍卫者。

sentences.en: He was the only National League umpire to wear an outside chest protector.
sentences.cn: 他是唯一在衣服外面穿护胸的全国联赛裁判。

sentences.en: He was the tormentor, he was the protector , he was the inquisitor , he was the friend.
sentences.cn: 他既是拷打者,又是保护者;既是审问者, 又是朋友.

sentences.en: He's a silent guardian, a watchful protector, A DARK KNIGHT.
sentences.cn: 他是一位沉默的守护者, 一位警觉的保护者, 一位黑夜骑士.

sentences.en: I regarded him as my friend and protector.
sentences.cn: 我视他为我的朋友和保护者。

sentences.en: It is designed to be with anti - phase & lack - phase protector and anti - icy protector.
sentences.cn: 设有逆相欠相保护和 防 冰保护.

sentences.en: Let us offer thanks to our protector , the wise and kind Athene.
sentences.cn: 让我们来感谢我们的保佑者,贤明而仁慈的雅典娜神.

sentences.en: Many mothers see their son as a potential protector and provider.
sentences.cn: 许多母亲将她们的儿子看作是潜在的保护人和赡养人。

sentences.en: Oliver Cromwell became Lord Protector of England - ruling for over 4 years.
sentences.cn: 奥利弗·克伦威尔成为英国护国公,统治4年之.

sentences.en: Our dog which is our guardian, friend and protector.
sentences.cn: 我们的狗狗是我们的守护天使 、 朋友、保护者.

sentences.en: They were very grateful to their kind protector.
sentences.cn: 他们十分感激好心的保护者.

sentences.en: Usually be used to soldering the protector tube, sensor, wire, reproducer etc.
sentences.cn: 通常应用在保险管 、 传感器 、 线材 、 扬声器等产品焊接.

sentences.en: Wei Tuo is regarded as the protector of Buddhism.

words.tran_cn: 贸易保护主义的；保护贸易论的
防护的；关切保护的；保护贸易的
保护主义，贸易保护主义
保护国；摄政政体；摄政职位；摄政任期
[油气][安全]保护器；保护者；[电]保护装置；防御者

phrases.tran_cn: 过载保护器；超负荷保险装置
浪涌保护器，浪涌电压保护器

trans.tran_cn: 防护器，保护装置，保护者，护国公，[英史]摄政者
trans.tran_en: someone or something that protects someone or something else
